alert.note: Alert for Riverside; San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 5:00PM PDT until June 22 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Riverside County in southern California... Northeastern San Diego County in southwestern California... * Until 600 PM PDT. * At 459 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hwy 78 Between Borrego Springs Rd And Ocotillo Wells, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and frequent lightning strikes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hwy 78 Between Borrego Springs Rd And Ocotillo Wells, Borrego Springs, Hwy 78 Between S2 And Borrego Springs Rd, Hwy S22 Between Borrego Springs And Imperial County Line, Ocotillo Wells, Thermal, La Quinta, Mecca, Ocotillo Wells Vehicular Rec Area and Santa Rosa Mountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
